quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: For it is in giving that we receive.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Coming together is a beginning, keeping together is progress, working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: The only impossible thing is that which we don't attempt.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful citizens can change the world.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Neil Strauss

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones that do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.text: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quotes.text: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link

quotes.text: Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
quotes.author: Hasidic Proverb

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110% all the time.
quotes.author: Don Zimmer

quotes.text: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind, as exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Fake it until you make it! Act as if you had all the confidence you require until it becomes your reality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: There's a way to do it better - find it.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Outstanding people have one thing in common: An absolute sense of mission.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Trying is winning in the moment.
quotes.author: Dan Waldschmidt

quotes.text: Fall down seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: There is little success where there is little laughter.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't let what you can't do stop you from doing what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: You make a living by what you get; you make a life by what you give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Work like there is someone working twenty four hours a day to take it away from you.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.text: Build your own dreams or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.text: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress; working hard for something we love is called passion.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.text: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
quotes.author: Ray Goforth

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.text: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak

quotes.text: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.
quotes.author: Philippos

quotes.text: Open source is a development methodology; free software is a social movement.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman
